request.body: {"generationConfig":{},"contents":[{"role":"user","parts":[{"text":"List 10 Nuxt UI components with markdown formatting."}]}],"tools":[{"functionDeclarations":[{"name":"get-component-metadata","description":"Retrieves detailed metadata for a Nuxt UI component including props, slots, and events","parameters":{"required":["componentName"],"type":"object","properties":{"componentName":{"description":"The name of the component (PascalCase)","type":"string"}}}},{"name":"get-component","description":"Retrieves Nuxt UI component documentation and details","parameters":{"required":["componentName"],"type":"object","properties":{"componentName":{"description":"The name of the component (PascalCase)","type":"string"}}}},{"name":"get-documentation-page","description":"Retrieves documentation page content by URL path","parameters":{"required":["path"],"type":"object","properties":{"path":{"description":"The path to the content page (e.g., /docs/components/button)","type":"string"}}}},{"name":"get-example","description":"Retrieves specific UI example implementation code and details","parameters":{"required":["exampleName"],"type":"object","properties":{"exampleName":{"description":"The name of the example (PascalCase)","type":"string"}}}},{"name":"get-migration-guide","description":"Retrieves version-specific migration guides and upgrade instructions","parameters":{"required":["version"],"type":"object","properties":{"version":{"description":"The migration version (e.g., v4, v3)","type":"string","enum":["v3","v4"]}}}},{"name":"get-template","description":"Retrieves template details and setup instructions","parameters":{"required":["templateName"],"type":"object","properties":{"templateName":{"description":"The name of the template","type":"string"}}}},{"name":"list-components","description":"Lists all available Nuxt UI components with their categories and basic information"},{"name":"list-composables","description":"Lists all available Nuxt UI composables with their categories and basic information"},{"name":"list-documentation-pages","description":"Lists all documentation pages"},{"name":"list-examples","description":"Lists all available UI examples and code demonstrations"},{"name":"list-getting-started-guides","description":"Lists all getting started guides and installation instructions"},{"name":"list-templates","description":"Lists all available Nuxt UI templates with optional category filtering","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"category":{"description":"Filter templates by category","type":"string"}}}},{"name":"search-components-by-category","description":"Searches components by category or text filter","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"category":{"description":"Filter components by category","type":"string"},"search":{"description":"Search term to filter components by name or description","type":"string"}}}}]}],"toolConfig":{"functionCallingConfig":{"mode":"AUTO"}}}

content.text:
Here are 10 Nuxt UI components:

*   Accordion
*   Alert
*   App
*   AuthForm
*   Avatar
*   AvatarGroup
*   Badge
*   Banner
*   BlogPost
*   BlogPosts
